plot: A cheap toaster is purchased by one man who thinks he's getting the deal of a lifetime... but little does he know that the deal is getting him.
title: The Toaster
plot_es: A cheap toaster is purchased by one man who thinks he's getting the deal of a lifetime... but little does he know that the deal is getting him.
plot_en: A cheap toaster is purchased by one man who thinks he's getting the deal of a lifetime... but little does he know that the deal is getting him.
